channel.title: First click Item, Second click Item
channel.description:
I've basically recently started a server from scratch and atm everything is ok but i need some help with first & second click item, for example eating food is first click item.
So could someone make me a switch statement for first click & second click item (Second click would be like right clicking on a glory and clicking rub) so i can use cases like case ####; cheers.[br][size=1]Posted on: November 07, 2007, 03:36:21 PM[/size][hr]Anyone ;S?

item.title: First click Item, Second click Item
item.dc:creator: @cwg452003 cwg452003
item.description:
@cwg452003 wrote:

Under this add whatever you want the item to do.

case 16:

For example

if (item_id == 4079) { // Yo-Yo (Walk) By Drags startAnimation(1459); }
